Developer Name is too long (max 40 characters)
Developer Name can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
Developer Name must start with a letter
Developer Name cannot end with an underscore
Developer Name cannot contain consecutive underscores
Warning: Entiendo que al cambiar el developer name, cualquier referencia en Apex / Flow / LWC, se verá afectada y debo actualizarla.
To create and edit query configurations dynamically, you must configure the JT_Tooling_API Named Credential:
The framework uses the Tooling API to create Custom Metadata records programmatically. Without this, you can only create configurations manually via Setup → Custom Metadata Types.
Find JT_Tooling_API (should be deployed with the package)
Edit the Named Credential and set the URL to your org's instance (e.g., https://yourinstance.salesforce.com)
For Authentication, select "Named Principal" with "No Authentication"

BETWEEN operator is not supported in Salesforce SOQL.
Instead of: WHERE Field BETWEEN :min AND :max
Please use: WHERE Field >= :min AND Field <= :max

labels.shortDescription: Error - NOT LIKE operator not supported
labels.value:
NOT LIKE operator is not supported in Salesforce SOQL.
Instead of: WHERE Field NOT LIKE :pattern
Please use one of these alternatives: 1. WHERE NOT (Field LIKE :pattern) 2. Apex filtering after query execution

Your query contains operators not supported by Salesforce SOQL: {0}
Please refer to Salesforce SOQL documentation for supported operators.
